title: Monthly Distribution Started
message: October 2025 distribution has started. Please collect your ration before the 25th.

title: Stock Update Reminder
message: All dealers must update their stock inventory by the 10th of this month.

title: System Maintenance
message: Portal will be offline on 15th October from 2:00 PM to 4:00 PM for maintenance.

title: New Subsidy Scheme
message: Government has announced additional subsidy for APL cardholders. Check your dashboard for details.

title: Quality Standards Update
message: New quality standards for rice and wheat distribution effective from next month.
